meanings.sent1: The machine ejects coins when you press the button.
meanings.sent2: The pilot ejects from the plane in case of emergency.
meanings.sent3: The toaster decided to eject the burnt toast in protest.
meanings.sent4: The volcano ejects molten lava with great force.
meanings.sent5: The spring-loaded trapdoor suddenly ejects the toy car.

meanings.sent1: The body ejects waste to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The sneeze ejects germs into the air.
meanings.sent3: The clown car ejects confetti instead of passengers.
meanings.sent4: The cannon ejects confetti at the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The geyser ejects hot water high into the sky.

meanings.sent1: The DVD player ejects the disc when you press the button.
meanings.sent2: The doctor ejects the foreign object from the patient's ear.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine decided to eject the stuck snack with a kick.
meanings.sent4: The superhero ejects the villain from the city.
meanings.sent5: The pressure ejects the cork from the champagne bottle.
